snippet: LEVINE--Noel. The Officers, Board of Directors, shareholders and staff of 660 Park Avenue mourn the passing of their former President, friend and neighbor. Noel served as President of the building from 1982 until recently. His unstinting service to his neighbors, his kindness and unfailing courtesy earned him the respect and affectionate regard of all who worked with him. Heartfelt condolences to his wife, Harriette, and their family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Noel. The Officers, Board of Directors, shareholders and staff of 660 Park Avenue mourn the passing of their former President, friend and neighbor. Noel served as President of the building from 1982 until recently. His unstinting service to his neighbors, his kindness and unfailing courtesy earned him the respect and affectionate regard of all who worked with him. Heartfelt condolences to his wife, Harriette, and their family. 1/3
